custom_fields.label: e-Waybill Status
custom_fields.name: Sales Invoice-e_waybill_status
custom_fields.options:
Pending
Generated
Auto-Retry
Cancelled
Not Applicable
Manually Generated
Manually Cancelled

custom_fields.label: Export Type
custom_fields.name: Sales Invoice-export_type
custom_fields.options:
With Payment of Tax
Without Payment of Tax

custom_fields.label: GST Category
custom_fields.name: Sales Invoice-gst_category
custom_fields.options:
Registered Regular
Registered Composition
Unregistered
SEZ
Overseas
Consumer
Deemed Export
UIN Holders

custom_fields.label: Invoice Copy
custom_fields.name: Sales Invoice-invoice_copy
custom_fields.options:
Original for Recipient
Duplicate for Transporter
Duplicate for Supplier
Triplicate for Supplier

custom_fields.depends_on: eval:in_list(["Registered Regular", "Registered Composition", "SEZ", "Overseas", "Deemed Export", "UIN Holders"], doc.gst_category) && doc.irn_cancelled === 0
custom_fields.label: IRN
custom_fields.name: Sales Invoice-irn

custom_fields.label: Is Export With Payment of GST
custom_fields.name: Sales Invoice-is_export_with_gst

custom_fields.label: Marks & Nos     No. Kind of kgs    Description of goods
custom_fields.name: Sales Invoice-marks_and_nos_____no_kind_of_kgs____description_of_goods

custom_fields.description:
Address of the place / port in India from where goods are being exported
(for generating e-Waybill against export of goods)
custom_fields.label: Origin Port / Border Checkpost Address Name
custom_fields.name: Sales Invoice-port_address

custom_fields.label: Reason For Issuing document
custom_fields.name: Sales Invoice-reason_for_issuing_document
custom_fields.options:
01-Sales Return
02-Post Sale Discount
03-Deficiency in services
04-Correction in Invoice
05-Change in POS
06-Finalization of Provisional assessment
07-Others

custom_fields.default:
CIF / 60% ADVANCE AND 40% AFTER DELIVERY

AT LUXEMBOURG
custom_fields.label: Terms of Delivery and Payment
custom_fields.name: Sales Invoice-terms_of_delivery_and_payment
